column5: A buddy is crossing at International Falls on a Monday and needs to pick up a fishing license on his way to Nester Falls. Where can he purchase a fishing license? I suppose he can get one on line eHHHH! Regarding crossing the border on a Monday, he will be crossing in the morning, is there typically a long wait on Monday mornings? Thanks
Nestor Falls Bait & Tackle No, there won't be much of a line Monday morning.
Rainy Lake Sports right in Fort Francis.https://rainylakesports.com/

Rainy Lake Sports is nice store, but it's out of the way if you're heading to Nestor. There's a Canadian Tire on the west end of FF. Don't let the name fool you, Canadian tire is like a Fleet Farm, with a nice hunting & fishing department. Otherwise Nestor Falls Bait, as mentioned.
Online is the way to go for license. You can buy it today and print it out and throw it in the tackle box/boat and done! Monday crossing will be easy.
